thread.title: BRIEF-Intelsat Says Satellite Telecommunications Network Signs Multi Year Extension With Co

title: BRIEF-Intelsat Says Satellite Telecommunications Network Signs Multi Year Extension With Co

organizations.name: brief-intelsat says satellite telecommunications network signs multi year extension with co
signs multi year extension with co reuters

text:
April 6, 2018 / 1:10 PM / Updated 11 minutes ago BRIEF-Intelsat Says Satellite Telecommunications Network Signs Multi Year Extension With Co Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 6 (Reuters) - Intelsat SA: 
* INTELSAT SA - SATELLITE TELECOMMUNICATIONS NETWORK SIGNED A MULTI-YEAR EXTENSION WITH CO FOR SATELLITE SERVICES Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
